meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed by music studies and academic expectations
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Kimberly, a first-year music major. I’ve taken a few music courses and really enjoyed them, but I’m also in a honors-level music major and a lot of what I’m doing is studying music theory, history, and performance. I’ve been in classes with very talented students, and I feel like I’m taking on a lot of pressure to perform well. I’m also in a research-intensive major, and I’m worried that I’m not doing enough research to prepare for music school. I’m feeling really stressed and anxious about everything I’m doing, and I don’t know if I’m doing okay.
